languages.text: "Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}, клянусь своей жизнью — я и мои рыцари сделали все возможное, чтобы обезопасить вас! Кто же знал, что Фесмофориус, обожравшись уродов, начнет своим дымом сводить мутантов с ума..."

"My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, I swear on my life that my knights and I did everything we could to keep you safe! Who could have foreseen that the Phesmophorius, after gorging itself on miscreants, would start driving the mutants mad with its smoke..."
languages.original_text: "Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа}, клянусь своей жизнью — я и мои рыцари сделали все возможное, чтобы обезопасить вас! Кто же знал, что Фесмофориус, обожравшись уродов, начнет своим дымом сводить мутантов с ума..."

traits.locale_text: "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, I swear on my life that my knights and I did everything we could to keep you safe! Who could have foreseen that the Phesmophorius, after gorging itself on miscreants, would start driving the mutants mad with its smoke..."

"My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, I swear on my life that my knights and I did everything we could to keep you safe! Who could have foreseen that the Phesmophorius, after gorging itself on miscreants, would start driving the mutants mad with its smoke..."

"My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, I swear on my life that my knights and I did everything we could to keep you safe! Who could have foreseen that the Phesmophorius, after gorging itself on miscreants, would start driving the mutants mad with its smoke..."

"My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, I swear on my life that my knights and I did everything we could to keep you safe! Who could have foreseen that the Phesmophorius, after gorging itself on miscreants, would start driving the mutants mad with its smoke..."

"My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, I swear on my life that my knights and I did everything we could to keep you safe! Who could have foreseen that the Phesmophorius, after gorging itself on miscreants, would start driving the mutants mad with its smoke..."

"My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, I swear on my life that my knights and I did everything we could to keep you safe! Who could have foreseen that the Phesmophorius, after gorging itself on miscreants, would start driving the mutants mad with its smoke..."

languages.text: “来自上界的大人啊，我敢以我的性命发誓，我和我的骑士尽我们所能，守护着您的人身安全！可谁能想得到，菲斯摩弗瑞斯吞噬了那些罪人之后，喷出来的烟雾居然会让那些变种人发疯……”
languages.original_text: "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, I swear on my life that my knights and I did everything we could to keep you safe! Who could have foreseen that the Phesmophorius, after gorging itself on miscreants, would start driving the mutants mad with its smoke..."

traits.locale_text: “来自上界的大人啊，我敢以我的性命发誓，我和我的骑士尽我们所能，守护着您的人身安全！可谁能想得到，菲斯摩弗瑞斯吞噬了那些罪人之后，喷出来的烟雾居然会让那些变种人发疯……”

languages.text: «¡Mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial, le juro por mi vida que mis caballeros y yo hicimos cuanto pudimos para protegerle! Quién habría imaginado que el fesmoforio, tras atiborrarse con los cuerpos de esos rufianes, volvería locos a los mutantes con su humareda...».
languages.original_text: "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, I swear on my life that my knights and I did everything we could to keep you safe! Who could have foreseen that the Phesmophorius, after gorging itself on miscreants, would start driving the mutants mad with its smoke..."

traits.locale_text: «¡Mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial, le juro por mi vida que mis caballeros y yo hicimos cuanto pudimos para protegerle! Quién habría imaginado que el fesmoforio, tras atiborrarse con los cuerpos de esos rufianes, volvería locos a los mutantes con su humareda...».

languages.text: "Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}, hayatım üzerine yemin ederim ki şövalyelerim ve ben sizi güvende tutmak için elimizden geleni yaptık! Pesmoforyus'un sefilleri midesine indirdikten sonra dumanıyla mutantları çıldırtmaya başlayacağını kim tahmin edebilirdi ki..."
languages.original_text: "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, I swear on my life that my knights and I did everything we could to keep you safe! Who could have foreseen that the Phesmophorius, after gorging itself on miscreants, would start driving the mutants mad with its smoke..."

traits.locale_text: "Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}, hayatım üzerine yemin ederim ki şövalyelerim ve ben sizi güvende tutmak için elimizden geleni yaptık! Pesmoforyus'un sefilleri midesine indirdikten sonra dumanıyla mutantları çıldırtmaya başlayacağını kim tahmin edebilirdi ki..."

languages.text: 「天の{mf|君|姫}、私は騎士団とともにあなたの安全をお守りするためにできることはすべてしたと誓います！フェスモフォリウスが異端者をお腹いっぱい食べた後に、その煙で変異体を狂乱させるだなんて一体誰が予測できたでしょう…」
languages.original_text: "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, I swear on my life that my knights and I did everything we could to keep you safe! Who could have foreseen that the Phesmophorius, after gorging itself on miscreants, would start driving the mutants mad with its smoke..."

traits.locale_text: 「天の{mf|君|姫}、私は騎士団とともにあなたの安全をお守りするためにできることはすべてしたと誓います！フェスモフォリウスが異端者をお腹いっぱい食べた後に、その煙で変異体を狂乱させるだなんて一体誰が予測できたでしょう…」

languages.text: « Votre Céleste Seigneurie, je vous jure sur ma propre vie que mes chevaliers et moi-même avons fait tout ce qui était en notre pouvoir pour assurer votre sécurité ! Qui aurait pu prévoir qu'après s'être repu de mécréants, le Phesmophorius enragerait les mutants avec sa fumée... »
languages.original_text: "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, I swear on my life that my knights and I did everything we could to keep you safe! Who could have foreseen that the Phesmophorius, after gorging itself on miscreants, would start driving the mutants mad with its smoke..."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Céleste Seigneurie, je vous jure sur ma propre vie que mes chevaliers et moi-même avons fait tout ce qui était en notre pouvoir pour assurer votre sécurité ! Qui aurait pu prévoir qu'après s'être repu de mécréants, le Phesmophorius enragerait les mutants avec sa fumée... »

languages.text: "{mf|Mein himmlischer Herr|Meine himmlische Herrin}, ich schwöre bei meinem Leben, dass meine Ritter und ich alles getan haben, um Euch zu beschützen! Wer hätte ahnen können, dass der Phesmophorius, nachdem er sich an Ketzern gelabt hatte, anfangen würde, die Mutanten mit seinem Rauch in den Wahnsinn zu treiben ..."
languages.original_text: "My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}, I swear on my life that my knights and I did everything we could to keep you safe! Who could have foreseen that the Phesmophorius, after gorging itself on miscreants, would start driving the mutants mad with its smoke..."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Mein himmlischer Herr|Meine himmlische Herrin}, ich schwöre bei meinem Leben, dass meine Ritter und ich alles getan haben, um Euch zu beschützen! Wer hätte ahnen können, dass der Phesmophorius, nachdem er sich an Ketzern gelabt hatte, anfangen würde, die Mutanten mit seinem Rauch in den Wahnsinn zu treiben ..."
